user_instruction: 'Tell John to send the team retreat proposal to me (susan@brighthorizonsms.com) and remind him he can check his Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

Could you please send me the latest team retreat proposal at your earliest convenience?  
Kindly email it to susan@brighthorizonsms.com. If you need any of the supporting details, you can find them in your Gmail and in our Notion workspace.

Thanks for taking care of this!

Best,  
Susan

final_output:
